roleset.name: hit repeatedly
roleset.note: FLOG-V NOTES: Frames file for 'flog' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from flog.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: whack whack whack
example.text: These expenses create a special incentive for ``Capital City's'' producers to flog it, or a Yank-oriented version of it, in America.
example.arg: it, or a Yank-oriented version of it,
